name: Avalon Lords: Dawn Rises
description: A Medieval Real-Time Strategy game combining classic RTS elements with modern fast-paced, epic scale single and multiplayer battles across beautifully rendered 3D maps.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: Intel Core2Duo or equivalent. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD3000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: Intel Core2Duo or equivalent. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvdia 750 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
